review_text: Great place! had 8 women stay for a bachelorette. Only complaints were some of the bowls in the cabinet were dirty when we went to use them and there was some existing damage- mainly the hand towel rings mounted to the wall had some issues and some of the curtains had tears. Otherwise we really enjoyed the space and didn't have time to enjoy all of the amenities since they provided so many decent options!
We loved this home! Lots of room! Enjoyed the hot tub. Lindsay’s responses were almost immediate… thanks so much!
House was plenty of room for the family and lots to do. Had things for even my 2 year old to do. Really enjoyed the home.

Very nice place. Lindsay was very nice and easy to communicate. If you message her with question, she is very quick to response. Her instructions are very clear and to the point. The place is outstanding. If I go to Cedar Rapids I will definitely rebook to her place.

amazing place.
my crew loved the house. it was a great place to end the work day at.
amazing people to work with.
communication was amazing.
Very happy with our choice to stay in this home.

Thanks to Lindsay's lovely house, our stay in Cedar Rapids was fantastic.
The house had comfortable and elegant interiors. It was the place that made you want to take off your shoes and relax.
Speaking of comfort, this place nailed it. The beds were cozy, and the living spaces were perfect for hanging out.
Cleaning? Top notch. Seriously, this place was immaculate. You could tell the owners cared about ensuring everything was spotlessly clean.
The kitchen had everything we needed, and thoughtful extras throughout the house made us feel welcome.
We want to return. I recommend this place.
We loved the house; amenities, comfortable beds, and great kitchen! Lindsay was a wonderful host that gave great instructions AND went above and beyond. I would certainly book this home again!
I honestly did not think the selfie room would be used. It was way more fun than I expected! House was wonderful, big enough for two families, kids loved the theater, we had a great time!
Absolutely loved this home!!!

The house was beautiful there was plenty of space for me and my three kids. There was so much to do at the house that we didn't even have to leave. My older boys loved playing pool and baggo. My younger one loved the selfie room. The theater room and the hot tub were amazing as well. We would definitely stay there again.
Amazing house! Very spacious!
Great house!! Lots to do for the kids. Big and spacious. Had fun with the selfie room. I would stay there anytime!! Supplied very well!!
House was better than I expected. Super grateful. The selfie rooms weren’t even shown in the listing photos, what a fun little area. Definitely would stay there again.
Beautiful home with lots of amenities to keep you entertained.
Lindsay was easy to contact and responded quickly. Very nice place with some cool entertainment features. Worth it!
This was a nice house, convenient to CR, Iowa City and the Amanas

This house was the perfect place to host Thanksgiving dinner for our family. The house is beautiful and has many great amenities for everyone of all ages. Would definitely recommend and stay again someday.
Great spot for our weekend getaway. Host provided a comfortable and clean space - great communication too. No issues. Would stay again!
great place kids loved the selfie station
Was a good space for the whole family to be together and a meal together. Big family so we needed lots of space.
Great place for our large family to stay with plenty of room. Great amenities!
Great place! We really enjoyed our stay in this cozy home. Everything was nice and neat and clean. Getting in was super easy and communication was great.

This listing is wonderful! Well appointed, sparkling clean and comfy. A great place for a family. This house has the charm of an older home and all of the modern comforts. Highly recommend and would stay again!
The building is beautiful and walking distance to stores, restaurants, and Coe College. Richard and Tim were great communicators and made accommodations for my schedule.
Great small apartment for a one night stay!

We truly enjoyed our stay at Richard's and Tim's Garden level apartment. The furnishings were very comfortable and it was easy to settle in and relax. The apartment was tastefully decorated. The location near the downtown area of Cedar Rapids was a perfect choice for us as we wanted to be able explore some of the dining and attractions nearby. The location on Ist Ave NE makes it easy to travel to other parts of the city. Tim's quick response with programming the TV was greatly appreciated. I feel that the apartment is a great value for visitors wanting to be near downtown Cedar Rapids. I look forward to staying with Richard and Tim in the future.
We loved the location and charm of this historic building. Tim and Richard are gracious hosts and we hope to return to see the garden in bloom!
Great place, great host, great location. Great stewards of a beautiful building.
great communication! wonderful hosts. 10 of 10.
Cute, clean place in downtown Cedar Rapids. No issues or complaints!
Great place to stay and wonderful hosts
Great thank you
Enjoyed our stay. Great communication with owner. Thanks for being so flexible.
Nice place to stay it did get warm but opening up the window did Hepp
Very comfortable apartment in a walkable neighborhood with restsurants close by.
The apartment and amenities were perfect. Loved that we had local cable channels. Building and grounds are beautiful. Appreciated the gym. LaCasita... local diner... is beyond good!

We had a wonderful stay! We came into town for a friends wedding so we didn’t get to explore much but we had a fun weekend! We went to the Map room for dinner- their burgers were delicious. We went to La Casita for breakfast- we highly recommend! It was convenient to walk across the street but Definitely go earlier in the morning since they don’t have a lot of tables! We loved the easy access to the parking lot and the condo was so cozy! We will definitely be staying here again if we come back to Cedar Rapids! Thank you again!

We have stayed at many AirBnBs/other lodgings and this one ranks near the top. The historic building with private outside pool/sitting area, designated parking and quiet apartment was exactly what we wanted. And though the location was on a busy street, we could not hear any outside noise from our unit. The furnishings, size of the apartment, amenities including TV/Internet, special touches in the kitchen, wonderful shower, etc. were tops! We didn't use the exercise area but it had equipment that rivaled a gym! Highly recommended.

We were so happy with our stay here! So clean and the courtyard with koi pond was such an amazing surprise! Most of what we did was within a few blocks of the location. Off street parking was a plus. We thank the hosts and will recommend this great place to “drop hat”!
Really neat place. Decorated nicely. Very comfortable. Hosts are very responsive. Bed comfort. Would definitely stay again.
I always stay at here when I visit my hometown. There are no surprises. My favorite place to stay. Would recommend to anyone coming to Cedar Rapids.

After a drive half way across the country, Richard and Tim's place was a welcome oasis. Before we even arrived, Tim and Richard reached out to us, providing us options as to our stay. The place was spotless and beautiful. Cedar Rapids experienced a crazy heat wave when we were there (105 degrees) and the pool was delightful. It offered such a lovely quiet and cool break from the heat. Any questions we had were immediately answered, and new towels were provided immediately. The laundry and gym was perfect! I cannot say enough about the lovely space and we will be back! We will be back!!!
Unique historical building with a lot of charm and close to downtown and Coe College.
Beautiful building, lovely space, gracious hosts. Thank you!
Came to Cedar Rapids to visit relatives. LOVED the beautiful historic building. The garden and pool were awesome and made it really feel like a vacation. We will stay here again.

Our stay was just wonderful. Richard and Tim's apartment was very nice and we felt at home. The courtyard was our absolute favorite! Its beautiful and so peaceful out there. Brandi the lady that takes care of the grounds and place in general was just wonderful. She let us feed the coy fish, which was so appreciated! Don't forget to tip her, she really deserves it, she works her butt off and is seriously so sweet!! If we come back to Iowa again, we will definitely stay here again!
garden and pool are well cared for. this is the first time I had visited in the summer, so was glad to be able to use the pool.

We have stayed in a lot of airbnbs- this stay was a treasure and at the top of our list of experiences. The garden level unit was secluded and felt special. The furnishings exceeded expectations, the bed was sooo comfy and the check in and check out a breeze. We didnt have time to actually indulge in the pool but I encourage you to make it a priority- the yard was gorgeous and I wish we could have spent more time there enjoying it! Just lovely. All of it.
Great place to stay! Close to everything in CR. The description matches the experience. Will stay again!

Immaculate ground level rental that is a 10 minute walk to downtown and an easy 25 minute walk to Newbo and Czech Village . This place has all the amenities- plenty of towels (including pool) and linens, fully stocked kitchen, and free parking! I loved the cold bottled water, the basket of snacks, and paper towels AND tissues (a rarity.) The pool, koi, and gardens were so peaceful!
I accidentally blew a fuse the first night, and Tim was very responsive and had the living room up and running again within a half hour.
The disadvantages were that being on the ground level of a 100 year old building you do hear the neighbors above; the shower takes several minutes to heat up, the toilet was a little slow to flush, the only a/c unit is in the living room so you'll need to leave the bedroom door open and ceiling fan on in the summer for ventilation, and the mattress was very hard.
That being said, I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if I am ever back in town!
Perfect place for a fun couple days in CR!!
Great stay. Apartment was cozy. Courtyard was adorable!

My daughter and I had a great time at Ausadie Building. The cost was extremely affordable for a downtown location, and for the amenities the place provided. My daughter enjoyed seeing the garden area and liked how the building looked. The kitchen was fully stocked with utensils, crockery, and the like. We unfortunately didn't get to cook there, but we did make full use of the snacks and water they had as we were on the go every day. Thank you guys for a great stay!
Great host and place to stay!

We had a lovely stay! The facility and grounds were immaculate and beautifully kept. The garden was an absolute oasis right in downtown Cedar Rapids, walking distance from great restaurants. The breakfast cafe across the street was wonderful - La Casita - try the churro pancakes! Richard and Tim sent perfect instructions for how to get in, and the info they left for guests was helpful and friendly. The blankets were soft, the towels were fluffy, and the shower was a dream. Perfect!
The apartment was very clean and well equipped. I would stay here again
This is a beautiful building furnished and fitted with all one needs for a relaxing stay. Walking distance to Coe College.
Wonderful hosts, beautiful building. They even accommodated a last minute room switch because of a musty smell in the garden level.
Great place to stay if your kids go to COE College!

This place is awesome !! The place feels like what I wish my own home looked and felt. Elegant cherry (?) wood floors...great galley-like kitchen...spectacular bathroom and bedroom...the ambiance is that of a very updated late 40's,early 50's uptown home. The place we stayed was amazingly quiet...Tim is an excellent host...at check-in, he guided me easily and in person ( I am an avowed technophobe so, I need lots of shepherding through the nuances of electronic entries). Tim was, also, there as we left...a gracious and friendly host..I will definitely book another stay here in the future, as my needs arise. I highly recommend a stay here to everyone.
Everything about this stay was very professional and delivered exactly as described. Clean, had all the amenities, and was a beautiful place to stay.

I was scheduled to spend 1 night at the apartment. I arrived late due to storms, so spent less than 12 hours in the apartment total. I love historic buildings & this one was cool. It was late & cold out, so I didnt get to venture too much to check out the grounds. It was decorated cute & very comfortable. When we arrived, the key lockbox was open, which was a little odd & made us think we might be in the wrong place. But all was good. I liked that the property instructions didnt require too much housekeeping upon check out. Some places require so much, but this was easy. My biggest complaint was that you dont have access to the thermostat in the apartment & it got very hot throughout the night. We finally opened some windows (as instructed in the property guidebook).

My husband and I enjoyed our stay in your lovely Airbnb, especially the decor! The shower was also amazing-great water pressure. If ever we return to Cedar Rapids, we will surely stay here again. Thanks for making our weekend feel more like home!

My husband and I will never forget our weekend trip to Cedar Rapids!! We visisted the Motorcycle Museum in Anamosa before checking into this beautiful building. The place was quiet and romantic. We enjoyed lounging in the living room with the fireplace and candles lit. I especially loved the shower lol super hot water and great pressure. The lighting in the bathroom could defiantly be better for getting ready in though. We checked out the courtyard, I'm sure it's beautiful in the summer! Close to many great food options, we found plenty to eat! We would love to stay here again if we ever make it back to CR!!

The Ausadie is a beautiful place to stay. Right as you walk in you feel at home. It was decorated beautifully for the holidays. When I walked into my apartment they had a welcome personalized for me. The space was warm and cozy and with an electric fireplace to boot. I recommend this to anyone who needs a quick getaway. I will be visiting again in the summer as to enjoy the pool!! 😁

Richard and Tim have provided an impressive place to stay at a reasonable cost. Beautiful building and classy decor. I highly recommend staying here and will do so again when we return to the area. We had everything we needed and more. I wish we had stayed a little longer to enjoy the pool and garden a little more. Thanks for a wonderful experience.
Simply put “a great place to stay”

My partner and I had a great time at Richard & Tim's place. It was very clean and had lots of lovely, thoughtful touches that really made our stay comfortable. And a great, convenient location! We especially loved making use of the beautiful pool. Would highly recommend!
What an awesome space and super communicative hosts!

I have stayed with Richard and Tim twice now and both times were great. The building is beautiful, and the unit is full of thoughtful touches. Check-in and checkout was a breeze, and Richard and Tim are prompt communicators. Finally, the location is perfect - just a few blocks from downtown! I definitely recommend staying here if you are visiting Cedar Rapids.
We were happy with our stay. The hosts were very thorough in check in instructions and had many nice touches to make it feel like home.

Hello to fellow travelers! I enjoyed my stay here while I worked at the History Center. Check it out!
Thank you Richard and Tim!
Richard & Tim’s place in Cedar Rapids is lovely and perfect for my needs. Everything was as pictured and their communication is superb!
This was an awesome apartment in an equally awesome building. I was on a road trip and wanted a kitchen for my food. The apartment was well stocked and comfortable. I recommend highly!
It was a great place, in a great location. Everything was clean and laid out great. Communication and accessibility was amazing.
Lovely apartment and has everything you need. Richard and Tim are very helpful. Would stay here again
Quant and charming stay. Check-in process was very well communicated and easy.
What a gem! Will book again. Host's are very thoughtful.

Great place! There were many thoughtful touches. Richard and Tim clearly put thought into how to make it a comfortable stay. It’s not quite downtown, but an easy walk to it. I’d happily stay here again 😊
Amazing property with tons of character and attention to detail. Tim and Richard went above and beyond. Will be back again when the opportunity arises. Thanks again!

Richard and Tim go above and beyond making any guest feel welcome. The apartment was very cozy and beautiful. I like the fact that only people that have access to the building can get in with a code. I really recommend it!! Such a great experience.
A comfortable and centrally located historic building with modern amenities. Beautiful interiors, great furnishings and wonderful hosts.

I have ony praises- I had a brief business stopover in Cedar Rapids and was able to book a last minute reservation- Richard and Tim's place was perfect for my needs- perfectly clean, well-appointed, all furnishings are like new, and the beautiful building has such a rich and interesting history- looking forward to returning soon-
Beautiful and very clean. Within walking distance to the downtown area. Extremely easy to access and the hosts were fantastic.
Really elegant place in downtown Cedar Rapids. Richard and Tim go above and beyond to make you feel at home.

The Ausadie was wonderful! Wel-decorated, clean, and cozy. Fantastic location, walkable to restaurants, bars, neighborhoods, and Coe,. Thoughtful touches in the room like water bottles in the fridge, snacks, creamer for coffee, and muffins on Saturday morning! Tim was great to communicate with, and a gracious host, so helpful! We can’t wait to come back and stay again-this will definitely be our go-to spot when we visit Cedar Rapids.

We loved this place, on the small side but well decorated and furniture was perfect for the space. Plenty of areas to sit and relax, kitchen was very well stocked. Plenty of towels for showering and the pool. We loved it and will be back for sure! Perfect spot for 2 for the weekend! Highly recommend!
Clear communication about reservation. Interesting building close to downtown. Enjoyed the side yard with pool and koi pond.

Great place, would be perfect for longer term stay. Lots of stuff for grab & go breakfast, loved the cold water in fridge. Loved the dual head shower. Nice size for 2. Laundry on premise. Everything we needed. Even though it is on a busy street it is really quiet inside
It was beautiful and rich in history. Richard and Tim have thought through every detail including amazing communication. My expectations were more than exceeded.
This place is perfect! Everything you could ever need! it's beautiful, clean and so cozy! Don't hesitate on this amazing apartment! Also very private
Beautiful property, lots of privacy.
Best value in Cedar Rapids. Spotlessly clean, wonderfully furnished, with thoughtful amenities. Highly recommend.

Richard and Tim are the best! They are extremely accommodating and thoughtful. It is clear they love this building and it shows through their attention to details. I would absolutely recommend this space to everyone!

perfect place - walk or short drive to downtown and art museum as well as Chech - Slovac Museum, also Brucemore. Pool at end of long drive was great, parking available, and some snack and breakfast items, all a great experience
We loved saying here. The apartment was perfect for our needs and the yard and pool was delightful. We will definitely stay here again and recommend it highly!
Look no further. This place is amazing. The pool was exceptional and the hosts were the best I have ever experienced in an Airbnb. Already planning a return trip.
Wonderful stay! Richard and Tim are exceptional hosts. Fantastic communication; easy check in; beautiful furnishings; free parking and great location.
Beautiful building and a nice, well supplied apartment for our stay. Thank you!
Clean clean clean! Beautifully decorated. Thoughtful amenities that go above and beyond, and too many to list. Great communication and availability of owners. Overall A+.
Nicely appointed and furnished. Comfortable bed.
This was amazing! It was cozy and comfy just right
Richard and Tim were great. Very accommodating and easy to work with.

This place was adorable and I felt as comfortable as I would in my own home. I arrived quite late and greatly appreciated the treats left for me since nothing was open. The apartment is decorated quite nicely and the space is used well. I originally chose this place because of the pool and loved the outdoor space it was in. Even right after a terrible storm, they were able to make the space both beautiful and relaxing.
Definitely a great place to stay. Clean. Cozy. The court yard was beautiful, nicely maintained.
Very classy place, perfect for a romantic getaway! I would stay here again for sure!

Ausadie is an amazing place to stay when in town in Cedar Rapids. The building is old and beautiful with lots of history. This was my 3rd time staying here, each time in a different suite/apartment. I love the decor and they truly have thought of everything for this place. Plenty of dishes and cooking utensils. My friend and I both worked full days from this place without issue. Quiet, pool, beautiful gardens out back- everything was lovely!! I'll book here when I'm in town again for sure (if available)!!!

We loved Richard and Tim’s place. It was very clean , beautifully decorated and comfortable. The gardens and the pool were a special treat!! So nice to have a gym too! Walking distance to restaurants, bars, etc. Richard and Tim were very communicative and respond quickly. I would stay here again.

Richard and Tim are the best hosts we've ever had at any of our many Airbnb stays! Very friendly, conscientious, attentive and great communication. And this gorgeous historic property with the beautiful bonus outdoor space was perfect. Super clean, nicely updated and decorated, within a walk to all the downtown restaurants, coffee shops, and trail. Booked again for next year!

The Ausadie building is a wonderfully restored historic building right outside of downtown Cedar Rapids on the edge of the Med Quarter. The building itself is right on a main street, but tucked away behind the privacy fencing is an adorable outdoor living space that has a nice pool and several seating areas to relax and talk or read.
The apartment itself was tastefully redone and makes you feel like you're at home and not staying at an Airbnb. The full kitchen had all the amenities for anyone who is wanting to cook some meals at their Airbnb. Richard and Tim were absolutely wonderful hosts that were extremely accommodating and thoughtful, which easily shines through during your stay. We even had a great conversation after relaxing at the pool on one of the nights. As someone who is local to Cedar Rapids, this is an Airbnb that I will *always* recommend to friends/family traveling to Cedar Rapids. The experience was absolutely perfect!!
What a GEM! Better than advertised! Excellent location, amenities, and value.
Richard and Tim are amazing hosts!! You won’t be disappointed, they will see to it!!🤗🤗
Such a great location and apartment! Richard & Tim help make it feel like home away from home. Will definitely be staying there again!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The apartment was very well put together and exactly as described. Richard & Tim were great host. I would highly recommend. Thanks again for everything!
Excellent place to stay. This is my second time so I had my expectations met in a different room. Richard and Tim are great hosts. We will be staying there again.
Beautiful unit in a wonderfully-restored historic building. Outstanding responsiveness and ideal location. Highly recommended!

Great place to stay. In walking distance to the US Cellular Center where were in town for an event. Cozy and clean, it was even better that we anticipated. Personal touches included with snacks and breakfast muffins for us. Kitchen was well stocked with appliances and equipment. Very stylish and modern, while being inviting and welcoming. If we find ourselves in Cedar Rapids again, we’ll definitely be looking for availability Ausadie again.
The Ausadie is awesome, clean and Tim and Richard have thought of everything to make your stay stress free and relaxing. The accommodations are top shelf.
Great apartment with thoughtful touches throughout! Just about a mile walk to downtown, able to just leave the car and walk around town. Well stocked kitchen, nice layout, and toasty warm!

We have stayed at Richard and Tim's on multiple occasions and have nothing but positive things to say about the facility, location, and hospitality. We recommend it highly and think you will enjoy your stay.

Beautiful building and apartment. Very tastefully decorated an comfortable. Check in was simple and location was great. Communication was timely and perfect. Would definitely recommend to other travelers heading to Cedar Rapids.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and felt so at home. Richard and Tim have done an admirable job of retaining the essence of the building while creating an inviting, modern space. Even though the weather was very brisk, we took time to walk the garden, koi pond and pool, which we would love to visit in warmer weather. We look forward to staying here on our next visit!
This is my go-to place when I stay in Cedar Rapids for work. Amazing amenities and a super stylish place!!

As fine an AirBnB stay as i have had over the years.
Exceeded all my expectations. Large one bedroom
apartment, beautifully decorated and appointed. Very
clean and quiet. If you want a good workout during your
stay, the lower level gym is filled with top grade
commercial fitness equipment. Is definitely my go to
now in Cedar rapids.

The building and the room was amazing. The ad doesn't do it justice. My wife was blown away. We got to appreciate the beautifully maintained historic building as well as a modern and luxurious living space.

A+. You must know that first thing!
These are some highlights that we very much appreciated:
*Stylish and well thought out - it offered much better space than a hotel room.
*Very clean - which I appreciate that above all else!
*Complimentary snacks & water bottles - love touches like this!
*Lovely, large shower.
*Full kitchen.
*Convenient parking on side of building.
* Close to sooooo many things.
*Easy, timely communication with the owners.
*Easy check in and check out.
We would recommend this place and would stay here again ourselves! Thanks Richard & Tim
The place was clean, roomy, and convenient for downtown. Richard and Tim were very communicative and check-in was very simple. I will definitely consider staying here again.

Good price for nice accommodations. It is an older building, but it is nicely renovated. We walked everywhere. Will definitely stay there again next time in town. Hosts provided some snacks, water and juices. Very nice extra!!
I have stayed in Richard and Tim's place twice. It is clean, comfortable, and beautiful. The thoughtfulness is appreciated. I will be back many times.
Amazing hospitality and the pool was a welcome reprieve from the heat! Thank you

This is, hands down, one of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed in! The space is absolutely gorgeous, spotless, has every amenity you could need, and is incredibly stylish as well as cozy. The location was very central to everything I needed. I hope I get to come back to Cedar Rapids again just so I can stay here in the Ausadie building!

Currently my favorite AirBNB! Classic building, space was well appointed, comfy...didnt feel like I was traveling! Only thing is, you can hear the road from time to time. But other than that, this is one of the best places I have stayed at!

We had a really great time in Cedar Rapids. The room and the grounds were lovely, and the snacks were *very* appreciated. The check-in system was super convenient— we loved it! An additional thank you for the personal message on the chalk board. An all around lovely stay!

At Ausadie you'll instantly be struck by all of the time, effort, investment and, attention to detail Richard and Tim have put into what must be a labour of love. It was like stepping back in time. From the entrance to the hallways to the garden. The building is a stunning example of early 1920's architecture that's gotten better over time. Inside, it's top class but comfortable - welcoming even. Especially with a personal greeting on the chalkboard, and fresh muffins, juices, snacks, and so much more waiting for me when I arrived.
They're super-responsive too. I had full details on the place days before I arrived. And, the couple of questions I had while visiting were answered within minutes. Five-star rating? Six :)
Wonderful place, lovely apartment, great atmosphere. Would highly recommend - totally worth it!
Amazing detail, clean, friendly, convenient and perfectly placed -- we could not have been more happy with our experience!
The place is very quaint and with great parking and access to downtown.

Second visit to the Historic Ausadie and we really enjoyed this time as well - in a different apartment this time around. Richard and Tim have created very nice, comfortable spaces that make being away feel like home! They provide lots of thoughtful amenities and offer extra special touches.

This is a very fine, upscale location with great attention to detail. The historic building has been beautifully reclaimed while tastefully updated. Tim and Richard are perfect hosts who have thought of every amenity.

This is a nice little basement apartment. The place was clean and convenient, and - for those who have been to Cedar Rapids before - far enough from the train that you don’t hear it. Richard and Tim are lovely people and they gave us all the information we needed for an easy check-in. I would recommend it.
This is a wonderful apt., tastefully decorated, and in a great location for seeing all the sites to see - ie. NewBo district, bike rentals, restaurants....
Great space & great service.

Delightfully older building turned into apt airbnb spaces. Comfortable with easily accessible kitchen. The living space was a handsome and cozy design. Bathroom shower was awesome. Bed was super comfortable.

The garden level unit was such a perfect place for our stay! Not only is the unit in a beautifully renovated historic building, close to walking distance to downtown and Coe College but every little detail mastered from sanitized tv remotes to muffins and snacks, great dishes for cooking and comfortable bed and sofas. Everything was immaculately clean and comfortable that we wanted to stay in Cedar Rapids longer! Richard and Tim were great hosts. So accommodating and obviously take great pride in the property. Thank you!

This apartment is absolutely adorable and so comfortable to stay in. Richard and Tim have made it so inviting with so many thoughtful touches. They were great with communication and incredibly kind. If I am ever in the area again, I would stay here in a heartbeat. Thank you!

A lovely apartment and very thoughtful and gracious hosts. It was nice to check in after a long day of work to find an assortment of snacks and beverages. They went above and beyond. Tim introduced himself when I happened to meet him in the hall during my visit, and was easy to contact before and during my stay. He kindly accommodated some special requests. The apartment was beautifully decorated and perfectly appointed for a comfortable stay. I’d like to know where they got the bathroom tile! Really a top-notch renovation. I highly recommended the Ausadie apartments and will stay again.
Great place to stay. We highly recommend it. Richard and Tim clearly "get it" when it comes to hosting.
Great place!
Richard and Tim are very gracious hosts. I stayed with them for an entire month and my stay was delightful. Thanks Richard and Tim! DSannes
You will be pleasantly surprised...a delightful stay!

LOCATION Location location and every detail full of refinement!
Loved the designer luxe feel of the whole space.
Classy and cozy and welcoming. If you are needing a fantastic affordable and private place to staying in Cedar Rapids...don't hesitate; stay here. Next time we are in Cedar Rapids we will stay again.
Highly recommend this beautiful place!

Definitely enjoyed my stay at Richard & Tim’s Ausadie Apartments. The space was clean, modern and extremely well appointed. Enjoyed the great cookies (maybe a little too much) and the morning coffee. If I have an opportunity again to be in Cedar Rapids I will stay here again!

This is the best AirBNB! The place is sparkling clean and exactly as described. Loved the location and all the special little amenities that they left for me. Truly a special place and I would definitely recommend the Ausadie!!
This space was well appointed and I felt at home immediately. The cleanliness and central location make it a great find. The pool area is a private and inviting . I will stay here again and again!
What a treasure! We thoroughly loved our stay here. The place is wonderful and is filled with many special touches from the amazing hosts. We loved it so much we wanted to stay longer.
A beautiful, comfortable space that exceeded our expectations! So much better than staying in a hotel, and more affordable! Loved having the muffins in the morning!

Characterful property well located in walking distance to the downtown, dining, & places of interest. Remarkably well equipped accommodation that is comprehensively & thoughtfully provisioned. Great attention to detail with hosts Tim & Richard going out of their way to create memorable stays. Highly recommended.
Great corporate rental. They were easy to work with.

We really enjoyed everything about the Ausadie and what Tim and Richard have done with the decor, the amenities, the surroundings, and more. But even more enjoyable (if that's possible) was meeting them both. They have thought of everything and each added so many thoughtful touches. It's a 'wow' place and experience!
Beautiful place! Great communication from hosts! Excellent hospitality! They provided juice, crumb cake, coffee, and waters. Will be back and suggest to friends!

Richard and Tim have created a very comfortable oasis in the heart of Cedar Rapids. Communication was great, and this is the best decorated place that I've ever stayed at. All the comforts of home. I highly recommend and will stay here again
The building was beautiful, and everything was perfect. Richard and Tim added so many personal touches, which made for the perfect home away from home.

We stayed at Richard and Tim's on the night of our wedding because we thought our house was going to be full of relatives. It turned out they got hotel rooms so our house was empty, but we couldn't have asked for a more charming and well-appointed place to spend our special night. The apartment was beautiful and comfortable. They went above and beyond to make sure we felt welcome and comfortable. They even had a special note to us on a chalkboard as we entered the apartment! Amazing!

Richard and Tim have thought of everything! The apartment is beautifully decorated, and has a loving, cozy feel. They have included a helpful guide on restaurants and things to do in the area, along with an easy to follow check out list to help anyone new to Airbnb. There were also personal tips about how to get the most out of a visit to Cedar Rapids - places to eat, learn, and have fun. This older home is nicely updated, having kept the original vent covers, doors, and windows, which gives it a nice charm.
With it being older, I think those thinking to rent this house needs to remember that the structure is a bit different than modern homes. There are not as many electrical outlets, especially in the bedrooms. The bedrooms on the main floor are very small so we had to keep some of our luggage in the living/dining room area, which is very roomy.
The staircases are very narrow and steep, the bedroom in the attic has slanted ceilings, which makes it very easy to bump your head. Being a couple in our 50’s and 60’s, the stairs presented a bit of a challenge, especially going up to the attic bedroom (which unfortunately for us has the biggest room and most comfortable bed). Those in their 20’s and 30’s would probably not have a problem at all. The laundry is in the basement, which also has very narrow steep stairs.
There is parking on the street and behind the house/garage (through the alley) The spots by the garage are kind of short, so if you have an SUV, it will not fit well. Luckily, the alley goes all the way down to the next street so you can pull out in either direction. There are also stairs going up to the house in both the front and back. So, it is important to know that if you have any physical limitations, this house is probably not a good choice for you. The keypad entry is at the front door only, but the back can easily be accessed by the sidewalk on side of the house.
The kitchen only has the very basics so if you want to cook a lot during your stay, you may need to bring some of your own things. They do have basic cookware and utensils, as well as a corkscrew, can opener, vegetable peeler and tongs. The living room could use more lighting so if you like to read, you may want to bring a book light.
Roy provides laundry detergent, hand soap, dish soap and even coffee filters. I am not sure if he provides it or if it was left by previous tenants, but there was also coffee, sugar, and powdered coffee creamers available. I was thankful that he also provides a first aid kit (which even includes Neosporin and Benadryl ointments) because I did end up using it. He also provides free wi-fi, a smart tv, as well as a full-sized hairdryer, which was nice.

Joan was so thoughtful and the location was very peaceful and cozy.
Sparkly clean, large comfy beds, impeccable bathrooms.
Beautiful and quaint historic place to stay. Loved the historical details and the restaurants and shops in walking distance. Would stay again!
What a fun place to stay! Wife and I had a great weekend away celebrating our Birthdays and Anniversary!
Great unique place. Lots of bars and restaurants within walkable distance.
Another great stay! So easy to get around and once inside all is as shown and the bed is a great sleep, too.

We had an invited speaker come to town and as soon as I saw Sue's place was available I snapped it up. It is in a great part of the city in a really beautiful square by the side of coffee shops, restaurants, boutiques, and extremely walkable from and to other parts of the city. Sue was also extremely responsive and made sure that the guest had a great time in Cedar Rapids. I cannot thank her enough.
We had a great stay. We got this place to surprise my nephew for his 4th birthday and he loved it!!!

Been staying here now a few times and each makes me love it more. Perfect layout. Location is surrounded by food and drinks. Great hiking/walking close by. Great coffee spot across the street. Oh the bed is comfortable and easy to fall asleep.
Great spot to stay to see the area. Love the unit itself. Roomy and has all you need. Large comfortable bed, great shower and water pressure. One of a kind location.

This is a beautifully restored piece of Czech history of Cedar Rapids; very clean and accessible. We like the location next to Newbo and CSPS Hall. A little distant from parts of downtown, but it is still walkable if you have time.
Such a fun place to stay and close to everything you need.
What a fun venue and comfortable. The shower is great. Well equipped kitchen, linens and very comfy bed and couch sleeper.
Wonderful cozy place. Easy walk to shopping and restaurants.
We had a great stay at the fire house. Easy walking to shops and restaurants.
The location is so perfect. This will be the first place I check for availability when I visit Cedar Rapids again. I loved the decor and the building’s history.

Would stay again if we were in the area. Good for a quick trip without the kids. Within walking distance to enough things to have fun for the weekend. Close enough too for a cheap Uber ride.
The house itself was fun too. Had a lot of history, while also being modern enough for a moderate stay.
Sue was responsive and the place was lovely and the store downstairs is amazing!! Fun location !!

Incredibly well restored space, staying true to the history but creating comfort! I had it for a mini girlfriend getaway, perfect for walking to restaurants and shopping. Being the only apartment we didn't feel bad about laughing and talking late into the night. Upstairs location felt extra secure for the nights I was by myself too. Loved all the tile and of course the micro museum. Recommended!
Sue is an excellent host! She answered all our questions and was very accommodating.
Sue was a great host, will def stay again!
What a great place to stay! So much to with in walking distance.
Our stay was perfect! The firehouse is adorable and the area is super cute.
It's a nice place, one of the more unique spaces I've stayed in.

We had a two night stay in Iowa with a 3yr old and a 6yr old. They, as well as us, enjoyed the excitement of walking up the stairs to find our little retreat for the weekend. Our children also enjoyed the themed firemen books and the games that were provided.
Please expect to carry your suitcases and all items up a steep flight of stairs. If anyone has physical constraints this is not the place for you.
The house also has a lot of windows, if you are sensitive to light like I am, or can only sleep when it is very dark make sure you bring an eye mask (which I always travel with), but it didn’t bother my husband or kids at all :) , the shades were plenty to keep the room dark.
The decor is delightful and the surrounding coffee shops and bars are all within waking and biking distance. I wish we would have had more time explore all the local places.
Perfect place. One of the best I’ve stayed at.

I loved the location and space! The kitchen is limited but I did not have time to cook, so it was adequate for my needs. I hope to return on a future trip to Cedar Rapids. Thank you for all your communication and assistance, Sue! You are a fab host.

We had such a great time. The airbnb was exactly like it was described on the site. It was super clean, and check-in directions were easy to follow. Sue was a great host. I'd highly recommend people to book with her airbnb. We ate at Cedar Ridge Winery the first night and Kingston Steakhouse the second night. Both places are great. Make sure to stop in downstairs at the stationary shop and visit the Almost Famous ice cream/ popcorn shop. The market across the street is also great.
Thanks again, Sue!😊

The firehouse did not disappoint! The place is clean and cozy and so homey! It was so easy to get in and out of. Sue gave great instructions that were so easy and she communicated great with us. There is so much to do in the NewBo area, and amazing food! I would absolutely stay here again.
the firehouse was a cool location with history, as well. nearby all the restaurants in Newbo and near the river.
Such a great location! The building and apartment were beautifully decorated and clean - we loved our stay!

Overall Sue’s place is the perfect location. It was easy to find street parking and I was within walking distance of restaurants, coffee shops, and the convention center. The place had all of the amenities I needed and was thoughtfully decorated.
I will say two things, the location is awesome but just note that if you are trying to sleep you will need earplugs, which are provided. Secondly you’ll need to use your own streaming service, which I wasn’t super successful in casting or logging in (probably a personal problem :-) ).
I’d definitely stay again.
Unique space and good location of your are going to be downtown in Cedar Rapids and don't want to stay in a chain hotel.

Sue was very responsive!
We were there over a beautiful weekend, and there was street noise. You may need to use the earplugs and white noise generator provided.
Great neighborhood- comfortable bed, well thought out amenities! Perfect for a couple or small family.
If you have plans in NewBo, this is the place to stay! Comfortable bed, great kitchen, and touches of history everywhere you look. We loved every minute of it!

My husband and I loved staying at Sue's firehouse-themed apartment. The location is right in the heart of the New Bo neighborhood in Cedar Rapids. The New Bo Market is directly across the street from the apartment, and there are several restaurants, bars, a coffee shop, a popcorn/ice cream shop, and other unique shops within 1-2 blocks of the apartment. During our visit, we enjoyed a guided tour of the Brucemore Mansion and the shops and restaurants in both the New Bo neighborhood and the nearby Czech Village. We would definitely stay here again, we and will recommend it to friends and family who need a place to stay in the Cedar Rapids area.
Heather L.

We absolutely LOVED our stay at the Bohemian Firehouse and highly recommend! Sue was an excellent communicator, and check in and out was seamless. The place was impeccably neat, clean, and full of character. The high ceilings make it feel spacious and airy. We slept more than soundly in the king-sized bed with memory foam mattress, and plenty of pillows for our comfort! The location is amazing too - we walked across the street to the City Market on Sunday morning where a variety of local vendors offer delicious fresh food and fun things to buy (think indoors farmers market). You can also walk to several restaurants, shops, and bars. Finally, it was just a short drive to Coe College, where we watched our son play tennis all weekend. Can't talk this place up enough. Thank you so much Sue!!
Very cool place! I highly recommend staying at the Firehouse
Really fun place to stay in a really cool area.
The Bohemian Firehouse was a great spot to stay! Very clean and easy to access. Lots of great restaurants within walking distance. We very much enjoyed our stay at the Bohemian Firehouse.
unique place and nice location

Loved everything about this place. So cute, comfortable and clean. Located in a great spot. Plenty of restaurants and bars in walking distance. Theaters are near enough to walk. Sue was very quick to respond with instructions or to answer a question.
Sue is the best host in Cedar Rapids. She has the nicest properties with good character. Would definitely recommend.
We would recommend this place to all.

This is absolutely what you would find in the dictionary under charming! Cute and comfortable (great bed) and in the heart of a great little neighborhood - and across the river from another quaint historic district. There is shopping and dining nearby (within the block). You'll love Script which is in the building - it's hard not to spend money there (we found their other store - Scout - in nearby Marion). We loved walking to breakfast at Brewhemia on the next block. We were there during a cold snap and want to come back when it's warmer and we'll plan to stay at Hose Co. No. 4 again.
This is the cutest AirBnb in such a great area of Cedar Rapids. Very private and quiet, but close to many restaurants and attractions.

I had the absolute best time at Hose Co 4 ! Such a fun charming experience. I am obsessed with the stationary store below and had THE best taco of my life at a restaurant nearby called Caucho. Walking distance to fun shops and places to eat. The kitchen and bathroom are roomy and you even get a cool exhibit in the bathroom. The living/bed combination was spacious and the mattress was so comfortable I never wanted to get out.
Plenty of fun design elements to create a fun firehouse experience.
Thank you for the Christmas Tree!

This space was beautiful, quiet, decorated with historic and super charming decor, and very clean. I loved the natural light during the day. The walkable location and free parking out back were great perks to this rental. Because it is an older building, it took a minute to warm up , but was cozy and comfortable once we got settled in. A nicer shower than I expected. I would definitely recommend this spot to a friend.
Sue went above and beyond for us. We had a lovely weekend stay for a wedding downtown. Highly recommend the place to anyone else looking.
What a cool place to stay! Great location, unique history, comfy bed and couch, nice amenities, overall great experience!

The firehouse is really a perfect place to stay in Cedar Rapids. We had an amazing time, and especially loved the attention to detail and historical element in the decor. Everything has been thought through for guests. The bed/mattress and bathroom in particular were phenomenal -- we both slept incredibly well. Make sure to check out the stationary store below!
Really loved the venue. Much better than a hotel stay. Was pleasantly surprised how cool the neighborhood was.
Great location in a really unique space. I would recommend to anyone spending a couple days in Cedar Rapids.
Stay was great. Very smooth getting into the bohemian. Bed very comfortable, great location, super cozy. The only reason for 4 stars is that probably to small for 2 couples
Lovely place. Highly recommend.
What an awesome spot - we loved all the history and unique touches, right in the heart of newbo! We will definitely be back. This spot is a gem and a must stay the next time you’re in the area.
Adorable, light-filled space.

It was a wonderful weekend in a wonderfully honored and well preserved place!
Communication with the host was timely and everything was in good, working order and as listed on the site.
The apartment is spacious and immaculately kept.
The bed was comfortable and the decor was fun and matched perfectly with the atmosphere.
Everything is within walking distance and there is plenty to do and explore.
On the first night, I had to retrieve something from my car at a late hour and I felt totally comfortable and safe while doing so.
The area is great for a variety of reasons and this place only heightened the experience. We will return!

Very cool restored firehouse apartment on 2nd floor above stationary shop, on main square in New Bohemia. Kitchen, good bed, A/C - all good. Would have given 10/10 if had laundry facilities. Will return!

We had an enjoyable 4 nights at the historic firehouse. The unit is comfortable and spacious, and it was great to be within walking distance of everything the NewBo district has to offer. Would definitely stay there again.
Great stay, cool place loved all The historic pics and info . Great place in walking distance

This cute firehouse-themed place was really fun to stay in. No problems getting in, and it was very safe and secure. There were plenty of linens and kitchen supplies, and we had everything we needed. We were there in the sumer, and the AC worked well. There are several restaurants right nearby. There's an electric stove, microwave and a large refrigerator. The king bed was comfy (not so sure about the sofa bed if you needed an extra). Even though the neighborhood gets very busy towards the weekend because of the Newbo Market and it's activities, it quieted down at night and we were able to find nearby free parking all week. Plus, they provide a sound soother and ear plugs just in case. We didn't use it, but there's a large TV. Some cooking essentials are in the cabinets, such as salt, pepper and oil. The shower was nice with plenty of hot water. I would recommend this place for 2 people looking for a place to stay in this hip section of the great little city of Cedar Rapids!
The firehouse is the perfect place to stay if you want to be in the heart of the Newbo area. It is warm & inviting, perfectly decorated & clean as a whistle. I would definitely stay here again.
Very charming place in a fantastic location! Loved being in the NewBo district. The firehouse is beautifully restored and well maintained. Wonderful!
Amazing stay in the most adorable apartment!

The firehouse is a wonderful and truly unique place to stay right in the heart of a fantastic neighbourhood. The host has put a lot of thought and creativity into making the place very comfortable, and we had a great four-night stay. The firehouse is actually bigger than we expected, and we were blown away by how close (steps) it was to many cafes, restaurants, bars, and stores. Parking was free and convenient and we felt very safe even late at night. This is a gem of a place to stay if you are visiting Cedar Rapids.

Great location to enjoy the NewBo night life, and great breakfast locations. Close to the Czech Village as well. Very clean and the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on. We’ve recommended it to our entire family and hope to stay again each year!
Lovely historic place to stay right down by the Newbo market. Can walk to lots of places or use scooters or bikes. Sue is an excellent host. I will be back!

We travelled from the UK to attend a wedding, but stayed a few days beforehand to get over the jet lag and to have a short holiday break.
The old fire station was so much better than a hotel. It’s so central that there’s lots you can explore on foot. An interesting market just across the street, with a park that hosted an art fair and live music on different days. We tried several local bars and restaurants, including the motorcycle themed Chrome Horse, which also had a live band.
We walked across the river to see the Czech quarter, and to visit the Czech and Slovak museum. We walked to the African American museum. We drove around the Amana colonies and had a great homemade soup in their former communal kitchen.
The ice cream in the nearby popcorn shop was outstanding.
So we had a great stay in a place full of character. We got used to the number of people taking photos of the house - and the young model using this house and the one next door as a backdrop for her photoshoot.
Hostess Sue could not have been more helpful, welcoming us with Union Jack bunting, suppling a kettle for making tea and an iron and ironing board so I could iron my shirt for the wedding.
This wasn’t a cheap place to stay, but it gave us a very memorable holiday and was worth every penny. Thank you.
This little gem was so absolutely awesome & in a cute neighborhood!! The shop on the ground floor was fantastic as well!
Wonderful place, exactly as shown, clean, close to great restaurants and bars. This is our 4th stay Sue’s properties. She does a fabulous job at all of them. Just book it you, you won’t regret it!

My husband and I stayed here the night of our wedding. It was beautiful and very unique. Centrally located to several shops and restaurants. Comfortable and inviting. Sue was an excellent host. Communicative and thought of everything. We would recommend this place to anyone.
Such a gem of a find! Not only was the space everything you could want, Sue was an incredible host! She provided so much great information and made sure everything was perfect! Thank you so much!

We are local to CR but enjoyed staying here for our wedding weekend! The location is stellar- right in the middle of Newbo (the best part of CR) walking distance to all the best places. The space was very cozy and unique, and check in super easy. We enjoyed our short stay here!

Our stay at the firehouse was wonderful! The suite is very spacious and comfortable and well appointed for a couple. We appreciated all the local touches throughout the suite. NewBo is a fun area and this location could not be more convenient. We would definitely stay here again!

My husband & I enjoyed our long weekend in the cozy & comfortable quarters of this historical fire station. We were able to sample the many restaurants and bars within walking distance. Great experience & very relaxing!

We don’t regret anything about our stay here! The place is charming and unique and the location can’t be beat. Everything was clean and well maintained and Sue was very responsive. I’ve already recommended it to a few friends, and I’m sure we will be back!
Awesome place and location!
The Firehouse was an amazing place to stay in an amazing neighborhood. We couldn’t have enjoyed it more!

We truly loved this unique staycation opportunity. This location offered us everything we to relax and feel like tourists in our own town! The location is in the heart of the NewBo district, offering numerous amazing restaurants within walking distance. The owners truly thought of everything!
Awesome place, close to everything. Very unique, great history to the building. Would stay again!
Good location, very cold depending on the weather had issues with heater and water

House and location were perfect for what we needed. The place itself was very cozy, felt bigger than the pics had shown. Bed was incredibly comfortable and the hide-a-bed was also very cozy and convenient. Lots of space and the location could not be better.
Very cute place !!
Wonderful location. Decor is filled with local artists from around the area. Walking distance to restaurants and the Newbo Market. Would be an amazing place to stay during the summer!
Awesome neighborhood & the perfect size home for a romantic getaway.

The Firehouse is a delightful space, comfortably and tastefully furnished and equipped. The location is excellent for the museums, restaurants, and downtown. Sue was easy to communicate with and very responsive. We will definitely check out availability of the Firehouse (and her other properties) next time we are planning a visit to Cedar Rapids.
Excellent host! A beautiful historical building. We had many choices of restaurants and historical sites to visit close by. A must see place to try!

I rented the Firehouse as my wedding headquarters. It met and exceeded my expectation. Since I and all of the bridal party live out of town we were able to bring in all of the church, rehearsal, and wedding dinner decorations into one location and did not have to run back and forth for the entire weekend. We had all three locations within one mile of the Firehouse. The accommodations were clean and all kitchen and bathroom accessories were aplenty. I would recommend the Firehouse for a nice getaway.
I would highly recommend a stay at the Firehouse. Well appointed and a great location
Amazing place to stay, great get away!!!!

My wife and I recently visited Iowa to see our family and celebrate my Birthday and our wedding anniversary. Not only is this place absolutely charming but the location was excellent with a lot to see with just a short walk. We would recommend staying here without a doubt.

I booked this location for myself and my groomsmen to get ready at for my wedding day. The property was clean and welcoming. Sue, the host, went out of her way to make our wedding weekend memorable. Check in/check out was a breeze. I’d recommend this location to anyone looking to stay there for a similar reason or for just a visit to Cedar Rapids/the Newbo area. I have no complaints about my stay. Thanks again, Sue!

We were serenaded by the Market Street Band on Friday. We may have photobombed a homecoming picture happening on the sidewalk below us on Saturday. A short walk for coffee, dinner, night life and amazing popcorn/ice cream. This is a happening spot in the heart of historic Boho area of Cedar Rapids. It’s definitely a fantastic place that I’d like to return to again!

Bohemian Firehouse is a fabulous AirBnB - lots of authentic atmosphere, room, storage and amenities. Easy walking to shopping, coffee, restaurants and NewBo Market. I’m a clean-nut and this was well maintained and cleaned. Highly recommend this property and the owner who makes the stay enjoyable and seamless.
This place is great. Perfect for a couple. The host communication was excellent. Sue suggested good places to dine within walking distance and nearby by car. Unique and historic. Loved it.
We enjoyed the unique stay close to lots of great restaurants and sites!

The photos don't even begin to show the historic charm of this amazing property! The host has thought of so many amenities, right down to the bag chairs for live outdoor entertainment right across the street. We enjoyed the bustle of activity outside during the day and the quiet, restful nights on the deluxe king bed and comfy sleeper sofa.
You'll want to be comfortable with climbing stairs staying here. They are a bit steep but just add to the character of the Firehouse.

Firehouse is very very comfortable. Sue was extremely fast to respond to a few questions. Coffee and tea provided; just bring some creamer cups to make it perfect morning time. Great restaurant was Black Sheep close by. Concert at McGrath was cool. All in all; a superb long eeekend stay

The firehouse is a gem in a great neighborhood with everything in walking distance. Don’t miss the large glass mosaic art by Grant Wood in the Veterans Admin Building, a 20 minute walk away, Wood’s largest artwork, and done prior to American Gothic. Very comfortable bed and living spaces, spacious bathroom, and enough kitchen for 2.
Jeff and Susan
Firehouse was a perfect spot for us! Thank you so much!

We really enjoyed our stay at the Bohemian Fire House. The location is awesome with access to plenty of restaurants & shops. The host was great and very responsive. We had a small problem with our internet connection and she responded with an hour and also dropped off a Hot Spot to make sure we had access.
A beautiful historical upgrade in the heart of New Bo. Great communication and hospitality.
Very good and responsive homeowner.
Great little place to stay! Super close to restaurants and shops. Spent most of the time solo and was never bored. A little loud at night but other than that great stay!

A unique place that was perfect for our first AirBnB stay! Located across from NewBo City Market and surrounded by shops and eateries we never lacked of something to see or eat. We walked a couple of blocks to see the Independence Day fireworks from the bridge! Sue was an incredible host and everything happened as it should have! There were so many little extras that added stress free convenience. Highly recommend a stay here!
A great, character filled apartment with everything you need in a perfect, central location!

This place is amazing. You will not find a better location! There is so much to experience even with the block of the firehouse. The firehouse itself is perfectly decorated and the bed is INCREDIBLY comfortable! My husband and I have never slept better!
Great spot and great host. Unique building, very spacious. Will be back again!
Great stay and location.
Great place to stay! Quiet, cute neighborhood close to many spots to grab food. Home was clean and well decorated. Would definitely stay again!

My husband and I spent the weekend in this cute cottage. I love the elegant decor, cozy atmosphere and quiet neighborhood. Matt was quick to respond to questions, recommended things to do and communicate often. He is the perfect host.
I highly recommend and will stay again.
Nicely renovated and cozy place. Really enjoyed my getaway here. Great amenities and kitchen and cleanliness! Would definitely stay again.

Joan tried to charge us for TV channels, snow removal, & then at the end of the stay tried to charge us almost $1500 to replace a glass shelf in the refrigerator which she ended up buying a new fridge instead of replacing the shelf that was broken because of food that she had stored in the freezer. She also tried to charge for normal wear & tear on a front door weather strip and a toilet handle. Also trying to charge us for snow removal & tv is ridiculous!
